type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Evaluating Formula Error

definition.text: An error occurred while evaluating a user-defined Formula at the Trading System.

paragraphs.text: While running at the TS, the LF Trading Bot encountered an error trying to evaluate one of the formulas defined in the Trading System. Formulas are arbitrary Javascript Code that users may write. The code must be valid Javascript for Node JS.
In the following section, you will find the information recorded when the error occurred.
You will only see the information if you opened this page as a result of the error actually occurring.
